title: Adam Farrugia's surprise delivery is revealed on Love Island leaving his fellow islanders confused
text:
Adam Farrugia's surprise delivery was finally revealed during Friday's episode of Love Island.

After getting a text message, the 27-year-old plasterer was instructed to go to the door to receive a delivery.

When he swung open the pink entrance, a bicycle with the words 'TRUTH BIKE' emblazoned across the front of it was waiting for him.

Scroll down for video

Ride on: Adam Farrugia's 'surprise' was finally revealed during Friday's episode of Love Island

'What is that?' a clearly confused Anna McEvoy, 27, asked her fellow islanders.

'That's a bike that you ride on and you tell the truth,' Adam told her flatly.

Earlier, a teaser trailer showed Adam relaxing by the pool with Josh Packham, one half of the twin intruders, when his phone went off.

Knock-knock: After getting a text message, the 27-year-old plasterer was instructed to go the door to receive a delivery

Rallying the troops: 'I've got a text!' Adam shouted excitedly, before summoning the rest of the islanders

'I've got a text!' the pair shouted excitedly, as they summoned the rest of the islanders.

As the group of hunky singletons gathered around, Adam began to read it out loud.

He read: 'Adam, there is a delivery for all islanders waiting at the front door. Please go and collect it.'

Pedal power: He then swung open the pink front doors, revealing a bicycle with the words 'TRUTH BIKE' emblazoned across the front of it

Intrigued as to what the surprise could be, the islanders then headed over to the hot pink front door to find out.

Teasingly, the clip ended just before the delivery was revealed, leaving fans desperate to find out what it was.

But from the reaction of the excited lovebirds, it was evident the surprise could only have been something good.
